name: Christopher Chisi
summary: Christopher is an aspiring applied data scientist with a strong background in development economics, statistical modeling, and research methodologies. He is committed to using data science to drive sustainable development and address complex socio-economic issues.
work_history:
LUANAR-Lilongwe University of Agriculture and Natural Resources: Research Assistant (July 2024 - August 2024) - Worked on the SMARTEX irrigation project for Climate-Smart Agriculture. 
The Diocese of Mzuzu: Sales Officer (July 2022 - September 2022) - Involved in the Timber Milling Program.
project_history: SMARTEX irrigation project for Climate-Smart Agriculture - Focused on developing innovative irrigation techniques to enhance agricultural sustainability.
skills: Market Research, Attention to Detail, Presentation Skills, English (Professional Working), Tumbuka (Native or Bilingual), Python, Data Science
education: LUANAR-Lilongwe University of Agriculture and Natural Resources: Master of Science - MS, Applied Data Science (September 2024 - September 2026), Bachelor of Science - BS, Development Economics (November 2019 - May 2024). Certifications: GYA Membership, Introduction to Programming Using Python, Introduction to Data Science in Python.

Christopher Chisi
MSc in Applied Data Science Student
Lilongwe, Central Region, Malawi, Malawi
Summary
Christopher is an aspiring applied data scientist with an impressive
background in development economics, statistical modeling, and
research methodologies. He is dedicated to cultivating a diverse
skill set that enables the effective application of data science in the
pursuit of sustainable development. Through his work, he seeks to
leverage analytical insights to tackle complex issues and contribute
meaningfully to socio-economic progress.
